tool_description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site
name: Tasty
title: Tasty

api_list.name: recipes/list
api_list.description: List recipes by option filters or name

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Leave empty to sort by popular as default OR one of the following : approved_at:desc|approved_at:asc

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Name of food or, ingredients to search by

api_list.name: tips/list
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to load tips (reviews)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of recipe id returned in .../recipes/list .../feeds/list .../recipes/list-similarities endpoints

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

api_list.name: recipes/detail (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get  more information of recipe if available, such as : ingredients, nutrition info, preparation, etc...

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id value of any recipe returned in recipes/list API

api_list.name: feeds/list
api_list.description: List latest feeds about new food, recipes,etc...

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: The timezone of your location in format of +/- hhmm

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

api_list.name: tags/list
api_list.description: List supported tags name for filtering in recipes/list API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tasty.p.rapidapi.com/tags/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tasty.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tasty.p.rapidapi.com/tags/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tasty.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: recipes/list-similarities
api_list.description: List similar recipes by specific recipe id

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id value of any recipe returned in recipes/list API

api_list.name: recipes/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestions by name or ingredients

api_list.name: recipes/get-more-info
api_list.description:
Get  more information of recipe if available, such as : ingredients, nutrition info, preparation, etc... This endpoint returns 404 status code, it means there is no more information to obtain.
* .../recipes/list already returns ingredients, nutrition info, preparation, etc...

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id value of any recipe returned in recipes/list API
